name: Flying Freddy
description:
Flying Freddy flies from his flamboyant flatulence. Yes Flying Freddy frequently farts after eating spicy food in a pflume of firey fluffies. 

Flying Freddy is great to share with coworkers or your boss for that last day in the office, to share with (old) friends in church or public place, waiting at the doctor's office, in a full elevator, or just simply to play when you want to have an excuse to let one go and still have something to blame. Yes, flying freddy frequently is the go-to game for many situations.

Compete with friends to see how far you can get so you can TOOT your own horn when you beat them. hahaha.

Flying Freddy isn't just a game for adults, because this game is not rated! Which means kids can play too! Oh the joy they will be having, By the time they are done they will be saying it's not only a joy to play, they will be saying it's a gas.

Flying Freddy has got it all for you in many ways, give it a try today!
